Connected Saved Search nearby Set date Set year month day Credit Card (Accept Visa, Mastercard and American Express payments) GT1, GTW’s the flagship product, is a portable smart device for cross-border internet usage, based on a “revolutionary” high technology called Cloud SIM. No SIM card needs to be inserted when the GT1 user lands in another country. Mobile phone, computer and other devices can easily connect to GT1 to have access to the Internet. Users can manage GT1 and purchase global data package or regional data package through GTW’s App.
HK GTWireless Limited (GTW) is a high-tech company registered in Hong Kong, specializing in could network technology and committing ourselves to providing better method and environment for cross-border business travellers and tourists to get on the Internet with lower cost. Currently, GTW has established cooperative relationship with different well-known telecom carriers in 120 countries and regions around the world to provide worldwide users with roaming-free global data.
